Hi Mediator san - 

Well, it's good to know people are still alive out there. I started to wonder if I missed something on the news that caused a melt-down of the sword groups or something. Hmmm...let's see what I can toss out there to talk about. 

Anyone ever studied the "dating" of Bingo Mihara swords using the full "Bingo" province name v/s the abreviated form of "Bishu?" I recall this being mentioned in NBTHK's Token Bijutsu a decade or so ago. One reason I ask is that I'm (eventually) going to write something for the JSS/US on a couple Bingo Mihara swords. 

Ron
STL

  Dewa,

  Andres

  >yesterday morning...seems odd. Of course it has been exceptionally 
  >quiet for the past week or so, so it seems. No replies 
  >necessary...if this comes to me, I'll know it is just very, very 
  >quiet out there in sword-land.
